description: This file defines a Flutter widget for an admin menu management screen within a meal ordering platform. It includes UI elements like headers, list items, and permission checks to control access to the screen based on user role.

classes.name: AdminMenuManagementScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the admin interface for managing the menu, including role-based access control.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: A widget representing a styled informational item in the menu management UI.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the admin menu management screen, including UI layout, role check, and conditional content rendering.
